element.name: TBCButtonState
element.short: This defines a style combining background, border and font for a single state of the button

element.name: TBCButtonMemoryUsage
element.short: This is the memory usage technique used to keep or remove bitmaps from memory of each state of TBCButton component

element.name: TBCButtonMemoryUsage.bmuLow
element.short: Uses less memory discarding the bitmap for all of the button states

element.name: TBCButtonMemoryUsage.bmuMedium
element.short: Uses less memory discarding the hover and active bitmaps of the button states

element.name: TBCButtonMemoryUsage.bmuHigh
element.short: Keep all bitmaps in memory for faster repaints

element.name: TBCButtonStyle
element.short: The style of the whole button

element.name: TCustomBCButton
element.short: Base class for TBCButton without published properties

element.name: TBCButton
element.short: Styled button with support of dropdown, glyph with positioning and transparency
